text:
Hey all!

Do any of you know a solution for limiting the flow of contacts in workflows (throttling)?

I keep seeing problems with custom code actions with API calls that exceed a certain limit. Unfortunately, I don't get an error back but “Successfully executed”

Hello everyone,
I want to create a workflow in HubSpot using PHP and attach a custom workflow action during its creation. Can anyone guide me on how to achieve this? I’ve already checked the documentation but couldn’t find any relevant information.

Thanks...
how do I create workflow for NPS feedback sentiments that contains comments?
Anyone experiencing issue with workflows' webhooks? no content is being sent
